description: Submission of a Delivery and Servicing Plan pursuant to condition 10 of planning permission ref: 181990FUL dated 09/12/2019, as varied by 201880NMA dated 24/06/2020, 204785NMA dated 11/12/2020, 203436VAR dated 23/12/2020 and 221139NMA dated 11.05.2022 for 'Demolition of existing buildings and construction of part three, part six, part seven, part eight, part eleven, part twelve and part thirteen-storey development over basement with educational use (Class D1) at ground, first and second floors to accommodate a 6FE secondary school and residential use (Class C3) on upper levels containing 113 units; construction of a two-storey residential building (use class C3) fronting Mill Hill Road containing three self-contained units; and associated bin and cycle storage, hard and soft landscaping and boundary treatment work, sports hall, outdoor play space, new parking area and other associated works'.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
